mapper.update: update doc_file set file_key = #{fileKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, file_key, file_path, file_name, is_deleted, create_time, update_time,file_type from doc_file
select id, file_key, file_path, file_name, is_deleted, create_time, update_time,file_type from doc_file where file_key = #{fileKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
